item.title: gdsfactory
item.description: “gdsfactory is a python library to design chips (Photonics, Analog, Quantum, MEMs, â€¦), objects for 3D printing or PCBs. You can describe your hardware in code (python or YAML), verify it (DRC, simulation, extraction) and validate it (to make sure it meets your specifications after fabrication).."
